mapper.select: SELECT bu.user_id AS userId, bu.user_name AS userName, bu.user_type_id AS userTypeId, bc_uti.code_name AS userTypeName, bu.sex_id AS sexId, bc_si.code_name AS sexName, bu.birthday AS birthday, bu.tel AS tel, bu.email AS email, bu.remark AS remark, bu.create_user_id AS createUserId, buc.user_name AS createUserName, bu.create_time AS createTime, bu.is_enable_id AS isEnableId, bc_ie.code_name AS isEnableName FROM base_user bu LEFT JOIN base_code bc_uti ON bc_uti.code_id = bu.user_type_id AND bc_uti.code_type = 'user_type_id' AND bc_uti.is_enable = 1 LEFT JOIN base_code bc_si ON bc_si.code_id = bu.sex_id AND bc_si.code_type = 'sex_id' AND bc_si.is_enable = 1 LEFT JOIN base_code bc_ie ON bc_ie.code_id = bu.is_enable_id AND bc_ie.code_type = 'is_enable' AND bc_ie.is_enable = 1 LEFT JOIN base_user buc ON buc.user_id = bu.create_user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND bu.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO base_user( user_id, user_name, user_type_id, sex_id, birthday, tel, email, remark, create_user_id, create_time, is_enable_id ) VALUES
( #{item.userId}, #{item.userName}, #{item.userTypeId}, #{item.sexId}, #{item.birthday}, #{item.tel}, #{item.email}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.isEnableId})

update.foreach: UPDATE base_user SET user_name = #{item.userName}, user_type_id = #{item.userTypeId}, sex_id = #{item.sexId}, birthday = #{item.birthday}, tel = #{item.tel}, email = #{item.email}, remark = #{item.remark}, create_user_id = #{item.createUserId}, create_time = #{item.createTime}, is_enable_id = #{item.isEnableId} WHERE user_id = #{item.userId}
